Hall of Heroes
Hall of Heroes: Challenge Details

Honour mode is an incredibly intense difficulty recommended only for the most seasoned of Home Brew veterans.

The most dangerous foes you'll encounter are more powerful than ever, boasting new abilities and Legendary Actions. Additionally, you cannot reload older save files in Honour mode if events go awry - your choices and their consequences are permanent. If your entire party is defeated in combat, your Honour mode run will end in failure.

If you are victorious and beat Home Brew on Honour mode, your accomplishment will be listed in game for all other players players to see! Upon having done so, reach out to the mod author (HaVeNII7) with proof to be included.

Good luck, adventurer. You're really going to need it.
Hall of Heroes
A recording of Faerûn's most honourable individuals.
This magical book seems to fill its own pages at rare and uneven intervals. Will you find your own name within, one day?

Let the record show that the following individuals have braved the greatest perils of Faerûn for glory and renown. May their exploits live on forever, a paragon of honour to look to in times of doubt!
